title: Interpretation of seeing dust in a dream and its interpretations

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing dust in a dream: It is known that the elements of the environment are interconnected with each other, and any defect in this interconnection leads to many serious environmental problems that can affect human health and safety and its elements. We see these days of air pollution with dust and the resulting respiratory diseases, in addition to acid rain that erodes soil and harms animals and plants, as the wrong behavior of people has negatively affected the earth. Dream.Interpretation of seeing dust in a dream: A person must realize that the environment is the right of all living creatures and is not limited to them, and destruction and damage must be limited to it, as the environment, animals and plants in it are affected by wrong human behavior and neglect of many matters. Which negatively affects the earth. Seeing him in a dream means that someone is treating the fortuneteller poorly. It also suggests that the dreamer is tolerant in his life and seeks to get rid of the problems he suffers from. Trying to remove him in a dream indicates many difficulties at the beginning of any romantic relationship. His descent From the sky, it portends to the man good people and happiness, God willing. The complete covering of the vision with dust symbolizes the problems and troubles that he goes through in his life. See also: Interpretation of seeing grains in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing dust inside. Home page. There is no doubt that every person has a house in which he was born, grew up, and witnessed many His happy and sad memories. It's the only place he can escape from his workload and feel comfortable. Therefore, he always makes sure that his house is clean and clean of dirt. This vision indicates that the dreamer will receive a lot of money in the coming days. It also indicates the burdens and responsibilities of the family. Seeing him in a dream warns the dreamer of betrayal and betrayal of those close to him at home. Moreover, It is evidence of the stability and happiness of a person’s marriage. This dream indicates that the dreamer’s desire to travel will be fulfilled in the very near future. Dream of dust in the dream: Are you married? A woman loves to do all her duties at home, including cleaning and arranging, because the home is an address for a person and reflects his cleanliness and arrangement, as he suffers Some of them are obsessed with cleanliness, so they sweep up dirt and dust several times. Several times during the day. Seeing this indicates ample sustenance and abundant money that she will obtain in the future. As for taking her out of her clothes, it shows that she has suffered many material losses. It also symbolizes that she is trying to achieve something that she greatly desires. Seeing her dust is evidence that she is going through many crises and difficulties during her days. Coming. It is also considered a sign of profitability and rewards after a lot of patience and suffering. See also: Interpretation of seeing a camel in a dream and its full meanings. Dirt in a dream for a man. It is known that dust is the dust caused by summer winds, which carries a lot of dust because it is one of the things that harms and harms human health. Therefore, people who suffer from allergies, asthma, and respiratory diseases avoid it. Seeing it frequently in a man’s dream is evidence that he will gain a lot from it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about sea waves

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about sea waves in a dream is one of the dreams that a large number of people see and search for its meanings, so let us learn today all of its important interpretations and meanings, whether they are good dreams or bad dreams, this is what we will learn today.Interpretation of a dream about sea waves in a dreamInterpretation of seeing sea waves In a dream, it is a sign of the rapid changes that are occurring in the dreamer’s life. Whoever sees sea waves in his dream is an indication of the temptations that the dreamer will be exposed to in the coming days. Seeing sea waves in a dream indicates the fears and problems that he suffered a lot in the previous period. From Seeing sea waves in his dream is an indication of the difficulties that the dreamer will face in his life in those days. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the beach in a dream. Seeing the seashore in a dream is a sign of the psychological stability that the dreamer feels at that time. Whoever sees the seashore in his dream is a sign On the good that will come to him in the coming period. Seeing the beach and waves is an indication of many problems and difficulties at that time. Seeing the beach in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s effort to overcome difficulties and problems. Interpretation of a dream of a sea without waves in a dreamWho dreams that the sea was without Waves in a dream is a sign of happiness that will come to his life at that time. Whoever dreams that he is bathing in the sea and is calm, this is a sign that he will get rid of all the worries and problems that he was facing. When you see the calm of the sea without waves, this is evidence of getting rid of sins and transgressions. Which she suffered from in the previous period. Seeing a large sea without waves in a dream is a sign of getting rid of all family problems to a large extent. Interpretation of a dream about walking on the bottom of the sea in a dream. Anyone who dreams that he was walking on the bottom of the sea and catching a fish in a dream is a sign of a state of affairs. A very bad psyche at that time. Whoever sees in a dream that he was walking at the bottom of the sea, and there is intense pressure in the dream, it is an indication of a major crisis that the dreamer will suffer in many days. Seeing a person floating until he reaches the bottom of the sea in a dream is a sign of diseases. Which the dreamer is suffering from at that time. Seeing the man drowning until he reaches the bottom of the sea is a sign of the turmoil into which the dreamer will fall in those days. Interpretation of a dream about rising sea waves. Interpretation of seeing sea waves rising in a dream is a sign of the serious changes and fluctuations that he is going through. That is, Someone who sees high sea waves in a dream is an indication of the serious difficulties he is facing at that time. Whoever sees in a dream that there are high sea waves, it is an indication of the bad psychological state that the dreamer is suffering from. Interpretation of seeing the raging black sea in a dream: Seeing the black sea A rough sea in a dream is a sign of a major crisis that a person is going through at that time. When you see black water in a dream, this is an indication of the bad changes that occur in the dreamer’s life during those days. A person who dreams of a rough sea in a dream is a sign of fears and sorrows.

title: Clues and meanings related to the interpretation of seeing a pig in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: What is the interpretation of being run over by a pig in a dream? Evidence of the bad deeds that she performs. Interpretation of seeing a pig attacking a girl in a dream? Evidence that he is very afraid of envy. What is the interpretation of a pig for a married woman? Proof of wealth and money. Interpretation of seeing a pig in a dream? Evidence of the money that he will receive. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant pig in a dream? Details of a baby. Interpretation of a dream about a pig by Ibn Sirin. Eating pork means profit and living from forbidden money that the fortuneteller must stay away from. A pig in a dream indicates an unfaithful man. It could A pig in a dream is a sign of an enemy conspiring against the dreamer. A pig in a dreamer’s dream may indicate an evil and malicious enemy, or it may also be a sign of an unfaithful wife. As for the religious interpretation, a pig in a dream could be a sign for Jews. Seeing a dream about a pig For single people: If an unmarried girl sees that she is hitting a pig in a dream, this is evidence that she has gotten rid of her enemy, but if she kills him, this is evidence of salvation from all enemies in her life. A girl who dreams that she is selling a pig is selling its price. Eating a pig in a dream for an unmarried woman is an indication To follow the path of deception. Seeing a pig attacking an unmarried girl in a dream means that she is very afraid of envy. Interpretation of a dream about a pig according to NabulsiRiding a pig in a dream is a sign of money that he will get. A pig can be a sign of an enemy that no one can control. If he eats A pig in a dream is evidence of wasting money. A pig can be a sign of envy. Seeing a pig dreams of a married woman. A pig for a married woman is evidence of sustenance and money. A pink pig in a married woman’s dream is a sign of happy news that she will receive soon. Escaping from a pig in a dream is A sign of bad deeds that you perform. Interpretation of a dream about a pig for a man: If a person sees in his dream that he is walking with a group of pigs and seeks to raise them, this means that he will lead people other than his own. Seeing a pig in a man’s dream is evidence of his separation from his wife and divorce in a short time due to problems If a man sees that he is walking in the street like a pig, this indicates that he will obtain a lot of money, but it will be accompanied by humiliation and weak religion. Seeing a dream about a pig for a pregnant woman. A pregnant pig in a dream is evidence of the presence of a male child. A pig can be a sign of natural birth. Pig is a sign of goodness and nourishment for a pregnant woman. Joy in a dream. Seeing grilled fish. Shrimps in a dream. Lentils in a dream. Seeing raw fish. Suicide in a dream. Vomiting in a dream. Feces in a dream. A date in a dream. A snake in a dream. Someone you love several times. Interpretation of seeing dead people. Ants in a dream. Jeans in a dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about black lice in a married woman’s hair, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about black lice in the hair for a married woman: This dream is one of the dreamer’s disturbing dreams, and it is not very promising, so he is looking for interpretations and evidence to help him understand his dream. Seeing black lice causes fear and anxiety, and sometimes it indicates food and kindness. It should be noted that the interpretation The dream differs from one person to another. According to the social status, the interpretation varies according to the dreamer’s situation in real life. Interpretation of a dream about black lice in the hair for a married woman. Seeing black lice in the hair in a dream for a woman indicates the dreamer’s fear of being harmed by someone. Seeing black lice in the hair in a dream for a woman indicates the dreamer’s fear of being harmed by someone. A dream for a married woman symbolizes a feeling of filth and bad things, and this vision also indicates impurity. When a woman sees black lice in a dream, this indicates the dreamer’s feeling of loneliness and isolation from all people. Seeing black lice in a dream indicates that the woman will be exposed to some challenges and cannot Overcoming these problems on their own. The interpretation of a dream about black lice in the hair for a married woman indicates that she hears unpleasant news about the dreamer, and this vision also indicates the presence of a mysterious secret in the dreamer’s life. The dream of black lice in the hair is evidence of a feeling of inferiority and also indicates that the dreamer He feels like he's not good enough for anyone else. This vision also indicates that she is going through a period of tension and anxiety that will dominate her life in the future, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about black lice in a married woman’s hair, according to Ibn Sirin. Lice in a woman’s hair is evidence that the vision is evidence of the good that the dreamer will obtain, especially if he kills him and makes him disappear. As for If a married woman sees that she has been bitten by lice, this means that she is going through financial difficulties and some troubles and problems, and this vision also shows that one of the enemies is pursuing her. When she sees black lice walking in new clothes for a married woman, this indicates that the situation will change for the better, and the vision indicates that The husband will receive a major promotion and the financial situation will improve. But if the woman picks up the lice and throws them, this indicates that the dreamer has committed sin and disobedience, or has committed a violation of the Sunnah. Interpretation of a dream about black lice in the hair for a married pregnant woman: Seeing lice in the hair in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates To pregnancy discomfort, the dreamer must immediately consult a physician. Seeing lice in a pregnant woman’s hair in a dream is evidence that her good wisdom is to solve the problems that arise between her and her husband, and this arises from the instability in life between them. When a woman sees lice in her hair This is a sign of easy childbirth and the birth of a healthy child. Seeing lice in the hair and biting the dreamer symbolizes the presence of some evil people and haters of the pregnant woman who describe her as things that she is not. But if the dreamer is able to get rid of lice in the dream, then the dream indicates getting rid of those Who want to harm her. Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair for a married woman: Lice in the hair and biting the dreamer means that she will face some obstacles in

title: Interpretation of a dream that I cannot speak, with seeing that you cannot speak in a dream

preview.html: A dream of not being able to speak or difficulty speaking, screaming, moving, and stuttering in speech. I dreamed of my voice not coming out and a silent vision of a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a divorced woman. Woman to man, according to Ibn Sirin, and more interpretations in the continuation of the topic. Seeing the inability to speak in a dream is a frightening vision, as most of the meanings of this vision are not praiseworthy and indicate the character’s impotence, weakness, and weakness, while some dream interpreters say that silence in a dream indicates a feeling of loneliness. And sadness, and in this article we will give you all the explanations in detail. Interpretation of I cannot speak in a dream. We are talking about the difficulty and heaviness of speaking in a dream, or even the inability to speak or stuttering, or the difficulty of speaking in a dream. Seeing difficulty speaking in a dream indicates a large number of enemies around him. Seeing That we cannot speak in a dream shows the difficulty of the enemies around you in real life. As for seeing someone who has become mute or mute in a dream, this is a vision that indicates many problems and difficulties that he will face in the coming period and with great regret. Sometimes some interpreters said that this vision It shows a person's lack of faith. If an unmarried girl sees this vision, if she finds it difficult to speak, then the vision shows the weakness of her character. Seeing the inability to move and speak or that you are silent and do not speak or move in a dream, then this vision indicates that you are a secret person who carries secrets and hides them. It was said that This vision has another meaning, which is the opposite, that your secrets will be revealed. Seeing the heaviness of my tongue, and a tangled tongue in a dream, this vision indicates the inability to control some of the affairs of your life at the time you see this vision. As for seeing a lover in a dream who does not move silently This vision indicates the presence of problems between you and with great regret. As for seeing failure in expression, it is the inability to understand others in the dream, and with great regret sadness and anxiety appear, but they will disappear soon, God willing, Blessed and Most High. Difficulty speaking in a dream is a psychological dream and indicates the weakness of the person’s character while he is in In reality, he is severely oppressed and oppressed and loses the ability to express what is inside him. Seeing difficulty speaking in a dream indicates that the dreamer cannot show hostility to someone, he is afraid of that person and in some way he cannot show his hostility to that person. I saw in a dream that I could not speak And my voice won't come out despite my repeated efforts. Maybe you had something you wanted to say but didn't have the courage and ability to do so. Maybe you've been hurt or abused by someone, or you're dealing with an aggressive, competitive person, making you feel like you don't have to. A voice or an opinion.” Interpretation of the inability to speak in a dream. Ibn Sirin says that silence in a dream or difficulty speaking indicates that this vision indicates false actions. If the dreamer sees that he is unable to speak in a dream, this means that he is hiding the truth from his companions. The vision of the inability to speak indicates Talking in a dream means crying and discussing the symptoms of others

title: Dream Interpretation I fight with a gun in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream that I fight with a gun in a dreamInterpretation of a dream that I fight with a gun in a dreamInterpretation of a dream that I fight with a gun in a dream could be an indication of difficult situations that the dreamer is going through, and God knows the unseenIf a married woman sees war with weapons in a dream, this may indicate that she is going through some situations If a young man sees a war with weapons in a dream, this may be evidence of a difficult trend, and God is All-Knowing. When a married man sees a war with weapons in a dream, this may express that he is facing fateful decisions, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams that I am trapped in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that I am silent in In a dream, silence can lead to weakness and incompetence, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees silence in a dream, it may be evidence of a weak character, and God knows the unseen. When you see a silent married woman in a dream, it may be tantamount to committing sins and disobedience, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of seeing an attempt to close a door in a dream for a single woman: The correct and complete interpretation

preview.html: Follow the interpretation with us: Trying to close the door in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of the dream is usually the first thing the dreamer looks for after his dream, to know the repercussions of this dream, and it should be noted that the interpretation of the dream varies. According to the viewer of the dream, his interpretation of the man, and through the following lines in the encyclopedia, we will show you the interpretation of closing the door in one dream. Trying to close the door on a single woman’s dream. I dreamed that I closed the door. In general, the door in the dream symbolizes marriage or the master of the house, and the threshold of the door indicates the wife. Seeing the door closed In a dream, it may indicate a delay in luck, marriage, or a delay in earning a livelihood. Seeing a closed door in a dream means that the dreamer suffers from anxiety about some matters and is difficult for him to make some decisions. One of the most promising dreams is to see a closed wooden door in a dream, as it indicates This vision indicates that the dreamer will obtain a living and good luck in his life. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is closing the door with a key, this means that the dreamer adheres to his decisions and has determination and an opinion. What is the interpretation of locking a door for a single woman? Seeing an unmarried woman closing the door in Her dream means that there is someone who refuses to accept his offer to her. If a single woman sees the door closed in her dream, this means that the doors of luck have been closed in her face, and if she is looking for work, she will not be able to find the right opportunity for her. The single woman who sees a door could be Locked in her dream is a sign of someone who wants to approach her and wants to give him a chance. Whoever sees in her dream that she is intent on opening the door to her room or one of the other doors, this is evidence that this girl is ambitious and seeks to achieve her goals with strong determination, and this vision is considered one of many visions. Promising visions where it shows that this girl will be able to achieve her goals. If an unmarried woman sees a closed door in her dream, this means that someone will propose to her. What is the interpretation of locking a door with a key for single women? A single woman seeing in her dream a closed door with a lock means That she faces some difficulties and problems in her life, and is relied upon to reach what she dreams of, whether that dream is marriage or a specific professional opportunity. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is breaking the lock on the door and opening it, this means that she will achieve a certain thing that she has always dreamed of, but If she sees herself unable to open the door, this means that she will not be able to achieve what she wants. Here we present to you the interpretation of one dream with a closed door. To know more interpretations of this dream, you can follow the article about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin trying to close the door in a dream and the interpretation of another dream. In the encyclopedia, you can use the application for interpretation of dreams. We hope that we have provided you with useful and clear content regarding your question today, and in the end we would like to thank you for your kind follow-up and we would like to invite you to read more from the world of the comprehensive Arabic encyclopedia.

title: Interpretation of a dream about leaving your wedding, Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about leaving a wedding party As today and through the site Various, we will talk about the interpretation of a dream about leaving your wedding party, as many blind people interpreted that seeing an unmarried woman leaving the wedding party means that she is not ready to take responsibility, but if a married woman sees that she is leaving the wedding party, this means that you are not ready to take on the task , Help yourself. Whether in the family or work, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream of escaping from a wedding by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted a dream of escaping from a wedding, indicating the death of a relative or the sudden death of this person. Interpretation of dreams that I am not ready for marriage. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the interpretation of seeing an unmarried bride. A pregnant woman in a dream is a sign of extreme tension and problems that she faces. It is also said that it indicates a lack of self-confidence and also indicates the presence of deception in her life. It also indicates the death of one of her relatives, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a mother who sees her daughter as a bride. Scientists interpreted a mother’s dream about her daughter as saying: A bride as evidence of the happiness that will come to her, and some scholars have said that this may indicate the disappointments that she will experience in her life, and if this girl suffers from an illness then this is the truth. It indicates his recovery from these diseases, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of seeing organizing wedding parties in a dream. Some scholars have interpreted that seeing organizing weddings in a dream is desirable, and some of them say that perfume is not desirable. As for an unwanted dream, it is the death of one of those close to you, and God Almighty knows best. Seeing the presence of joy in a dream interprets seeing the presence of joys in a dream, as it indicates a transition from one stage to another, which indicates a lot of goodness, happiness, and contentment, and some say that it indicates death or fear. Or anxiety. Interpretation of a dream about joy without a bride and groom. Interpretation of a dream about joy without a groom indicates the imminent death of someone close to him. It also indicates the great development that the dreamer is making in his life and may indicate the presence of some marital problems and disputes that will end in divorce. As for seeing a wedding without a bride, this indicates the impossibility of achieving any of its goals, and God Almighty knows best. Seeing a white suit in a dream. Scientists have interpreted that seeing a white suit in a dream means a lot, and getting married to her soon, and God Almighty knows best. Wearing a white suit in a dream for married people. We interpret the dream of the suit. White is for a married woman, and a married woman’s dream indicates achieving goals and ambitions in the future, but if she sees herself wearing a short dress, this indicates a deficiency in performing worship. The presence of a defect forces her to repent and draw closer to God, but if the dress is beautiful in appearance, it indicates that it is very good, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about leaving your wedding party for a pregnant woman. Scientists interpreted the meaning of joy and the presence of the bride and groom in a pregnant woman’s dream. This indicates that her birth date is approaching, and it will be easy. However, if she sees herself wearing a white suit and the groom is absent, this indicates that she will give birth to a boy, and if she gives birth to another son, this indicates that she will marry him, and soon God knows best. Interpretation

title: Losing a coat in a dream

preview.html: Let us learn about the interpretation of losing it in a dream about the sayings of the scholars of interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about losing a coat in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl dreams of losing her coat in a dream, this may mean that she has lost something important in her life. This may indicate that there are people who talk about her bad ways and want to hurt her. But if the girl sees that her coat is lost in a dream, and it is a torn coat. This may indicate her salvation from the things that were hurting her in her life. This dream can be interpreted as the unmarried girl getting rid of a person with whom she has a relationship, but he was bad in nature. Seeing a single girl losing her expensive coat in a dream. This may indicate that he is far from the path of religion and that he needs to get closer to God. It can also indicate that there are some problems in her life or her financial stumbling, which makes her unable to meet her demands. Interpretation of seeing a lost coat in a dream for a married woman The dream of losing a coat in a dream for a married woman is interpreted as the appearance of a marital vortex that will end soon and stability will appear again. If a married woman sees that she was wearing a coat and lost it in a dream. This may indicate that she needs more attention from her husband. But if he sees that he was wearing A coat in a dream. This may indicate that she has obtained a large livelihood, abundant living and coverage in her home. Interpretation of seeing a woman's coat lost in a dream, and the coat was old and worthless. This may indicate a change in her circumstances for the better and relieve her of her problems with her husband. If the lost coat in the dream is expensive and of great value. This may mean that she does not care about her husband and her home and that this may threaten her relationship with her husband. You may be interested: Interpretation of seeing a coat in a dream in detail Interpretation of a dream about losing a coat in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman dreams that she is losing her coat in a dream. This dream may indicate that she is suffering from health problems during pregnancy, but she will recover quickly from them. Seeing a pregnant woman lose her coat in a dream, it is worthless or torn. This is not her salvation from the psychological pressures she is currently experiencing and she will pass peacefully, God willing. But if she loses her precious coat in a dream. This dream may indicate the dreamer's need for confirmation from those around her and attention from her husband. Seeing a pregnant woman lose her coat in a dream and then finding it again. This may indicate that her birth will take place without problems or pain, because she feels tired during Pregnancy. Interpretation of seeing the loss of a coat in a dream for a divorced woman. The vision of a divorced woman losing her coat in a dream may indicate her many fears in the current period and her need for a bond that compensates her for her previous experience with her first husband. Interpretation of losing a coat in a dream for a divorced woman may be a feeling of injustice and slander against her and her desperate attempt to prove her rights after the divorce. If she dreams of losing her coat and it was of great value and attractive shape. This can indicate a loss of a sense of security and connection, and a feeling of loneliness and depression. The divorced woman saw that her coat was stolen. This may indicate that her divorce

title: Interpretation of the name Sultana in a dream by leading scholars

preview.html: The name Sultana in a dream. Many mothers are confused if they are announced by a female, given the large number of names and every day something new, and among these names is the name Sultana, which carries many connotations and meanings that we will discuss in the next article. The name Sultana in a dream, undoubtedly. In it, seeing the name Sultana in a dream is good news, because the name indicates high status and position in society. Some scholars interpret seeing the name Sultana in the dreamer’s dream as a sign of assuming high positions and leadership, while other jurists believe that it indicates God’s approval - Glory be to Him - about the dreamer. The name Sultana in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer sees the name Sultana in his dream and is happy, this is a sign of very good and ample nourishment that he will receive in the near future. Ibn Sirin explains that the dreamer saw the name Sultana during sleep and felt sad as a sign of committing sins. And sins. If the dreamer is a woman and sees the name Sultana in her dream, this symbolizes her distinguished status and the shortness of her access to high positions. Ibn Sirin explains that seeing the name Sultana in a dream proves his strength and victory over his enemies and the fulfillment of his dreams and aspirations. An unmarried woman who sees the name Sultana in Her dream indicates that she will be associated with a good person in the very near future, while the pregnant woman she sees is an indication of the abundance of good things that she will enjoy. During her pregnancy. The name Sultana in an unmarried woman’s dream. An unmarried woman who sees the name Sultana in her dream indicates that she will soon marry a young man with good intentions who has a place among everyone. If a girl dreams that a young man named Sultan gives her roses, this indicates the possibility of her marrying someone Relatives and that he will be a well-to-do boy. Seeing a virgin named Sultana in her dream as she feels sad and bows her head symbolizes the difficulty of the coming period and exposes her to some problems. Seeing the name Sultana in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her marriage to a brave, strong, and dynamic person. In general, seeing the name Sultana In a girl’s dream, it indicates the joy and happiness that will decorate her life in the coming period. The name Sultana in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees the name Sultana in her dream, this is a sign that her husband will get a lot of money and improve her financial level. A married woman who sees the name Sultana in The dream indicates that she will enjoy abundant gifts and benefits in her coming days. Some commentators say that seeing the name Sultana in a dream for a married woman indicates the father or husband because of their high status and authority over her. The name Sultana in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream a woman named Sultana and smiles at her, This indicates the abundance of livelihood and the large sum that she will receive from her work. A pregnant woman who sees the name Sultana in her dream will give birth easily without problems and difficulties. If a pregnant woman sees the name Sultana in her dream, this is a sign that she will receive good news and is assured that her health and well-being will be
